M

MirroredDataSource - Class in org.nosco
This class wraps other javax.sql.DataSource instances.
MirroredDataSource(DataSource, DataSource...) - Constructor for class org.nosco.MirroredDataSource
This class usually passes through calls to the primary, but if getMirroredConnection() is called a random mirror is used instead.
